globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 2
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 3
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You march toward the holding facility where Draylen is being kept as fast as you can, knowing he could be terminated at any moment. As you're met by guards, MHD-19 strides into the fray without fear. Somehow, even in his mechanical eyes, you can see his fierce desire to save his friend.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Draylen will be executed at the end of Round 3 if the door to the Containment Area is closed.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Containment Area opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when Draylen is executed.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Draylen will be executed at the end of Round 3 if the door to the Containment Area is closed.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Containment Area opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when Draylen is executed.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
“Dee?” a dazed Draylen says as he looks up into the droid’s face. “You came for me. I knew you would...” He falls asleep from exhaustion as MHD-19 begins to dutifully attend to his injuries.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} MHD-19 receives the “Systems Upgrade” Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
MHD-19 looks into the dying eyes of his former liberator. “It’s not your fault, Dee,” he says, before drifting away. The droid is inconsolable for days.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Draylen executed
globalEvents.eventText:
You are still struggling with the defenders of the facility when you hear an announcement over the station's comm systems. "Execution commencing." A single blaster shot rings out.

You later find Draylen outside the facility, dumped into the snow unceremoniously, blood coloring the snow red. Not even MHD-19's skills are able to save him.

globalEvents.name: Impassable
globalEvents.eventText: The door to the holding facility slides open.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText: A sturdy door leads into the holding facility.

eventActions.theText: As you burst in, looking for Draylen, red-armored guards move to block your way.

globalEvents.name: Loyalty Fulfilled
globalEvents.eventText: Finally, the door to the containment area bursts open. Behind lies a large room where everything is being prepared for the execution.

eventActions.theText: Block access to the evacuation point.

entityProperties.name: Door 2
entityProperties.theText: The transparisteel door leads into the containment area.

eventActions.theText: Draylen's jailors immediately rush forward to stop you.
At the other end of the room, an exhausted Draylen looks up in surprise, then seems to draw strength from your appearance. He manages to break his binders and stumbles to his legs.

{-} The Rebel mission token represents Draylen. Draylen is a Rebel figure (Health: 6 plus the threat level, Speed: 2, Defense: 1 white die). Heroes control Draylen as an ally.
{-} When an attack targeting Draylen is declared, a healthy hero adjacent to Draylen can choose to defend him. If he does, add 1 black die to the defense pool. After the attack resolves, that hero suffers {H} equal to the {G} results.

entityProperties.name: Evacuation Point
entityProperties.theText:
Your escape shuttle waits directly behind this hill.

{-} Draylen can escape through the evacuation point. When he does, click "Draylen escapes" to end the mission.

eventActions.theText:
You rush forward to protect Draylen.

{-} Draylen can escape through the Evacuation Point (green highlighted area). When he does, click the green highlight and select "Draylen escapes".
{-} The Rebels win when Draylen escapes.
{-} The Rebels lose when Draylen is defeated.

{-} The Rebel mission token represents Draylen. Draylen is a Rebel figure (Health: 6 plus the threat level, Speed: 2, Defense: 1 white die). Heroes control Draylen as an ally.
{-} When an attack targeting Draylen is declared, a healthy hero adjacent to Draylen can choose to defend him. If he does, add 1 black die to the defense pool. After the attack resolves, that hero suffers {H} equal to the {G} results.
{-} Draylen can escape through the Evacuation Point (green highlighted area). When he does, click the green highlight and select "Draylen escapes".
{-} The Rebels win when Draylen escapes.
{-} The Rebels lose when Draylen is defeated.
